get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Promotion resources.
get.description: Retrieves the collection of Promotion resources.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of items per page

post.description:
Creates a Promotion resource.

 Allowed rule types: `customer_group`, `nth_order`, `shipping_country`, `has_taxon`, `total_of_items_from_taxon`, `contains_product`, `item_total`, `cart_quantity` 

 Allowed action types: `order_fixed_discount`, `unit_fixed_discount`, `order_percentage_discount`, `unit_percentage_discount`, `shipping_percentage_discount`

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Locales in this enum are all locales defined in the shop and only enabled ones will work in the given channel in the shop.

put.description:
Replaces the Promotion resource.

 Allowed rule types: `customer_group`, `nth_order`, `shipping_country`, `has_taxon`, `total_of_items_from_taxon`, `contains_product`, `item_total`, `cart_quantity` 

 Allowed action types: `order_fixed_discount`, `unit_fixed_discount`, `order_percentage_discount`, `unit_percentage_discount`, `shipping_percentage_discount`

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Locales in this enum are all locales defined in the shop and only enabled ones will work in the given channel in the shop.

parameters.name: Accept-Language

post.description:
Creates a ShippingMethod resource.

 Allowed rule types: `total_weight_greater_than_or_equal`, `total_weight_less_than_or_equal`, `order_total_greater_than_or_equal`, `order_total_less_than_or_equal` 

 Allowed calculators: `flat_rate`, `per_unit_rate`

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Locales in this enum are all locales defined in the shop and only enabled ones will work in the given channel in the shop.

put.description:
Replaces the ShippingMethod resource.

 Allowed rule types: `total_weight_greater_than_or_equal`, `total_weight_less_than_or_equal`, `order_total_greater_than_or_equal`, `order_total_less_than_or_equal` 

 Allowed calculators: `flat_rate`, `per_unit_rate`
